name: nnsplit
description: Fast, robust sentence splitting with bindings for Python, Rust and Javascript.

scripts.build: wasm-pack build && npm install --no-save pkg/ && cp -a package.json pkg/package.json
scripts.start_test_server: cd dev_server && node download_models.js && npm install && npx webpack-dev-server --host=8080

author: Benjamin Minixhofer <bminixhofer@gmail.com>
